description.value:
Wondrous item, rare
This feather token is shaped like a black moon. As an action, you can brush the feather over a willing creatureâ€™s eyes to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For 1 hour, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet, including in magical darkness.
